sentences.english: Besides lacking in hygiene, some lack common sense as well.
sentences.chinese: 有些女生除了没有清洁意识之外，还缺乏基本常识。

sentences.english: The second is to master fire, fire extinguishing basic common sense.
sentences.chinese: 二是掌握防火，灭火基本常识。

sentences.english: In this article we provide you with some common sense guidelines for setting your own portal governance strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文将向您介绍设置门户管理策略的一些常识性指南。

sentences.english: Common sense, logic and the trend in the law supports this decision.
sentences.chinese: 普通常识，逻辑以及法律的趋势都支持了这个裁定。

sentences.english: We hope they use common sense ...
sentences.chinese: 我们希望他们运用常识。

sentences.english: They show a good deal more common sense than the politicians.
sentences.chinese: 他们展示的常识出比政治家多得多。

sentences.english: Paul wants Christians to be governed by common sense that looks out for their fellow brother or sister.
sentences.chinese: 保罗要基督徒凭着常识为他们团契的弟兄姐妹着想。

sentences.english: Reducing spending while still investing in the future is just common sense.
sentences.chinese: 减少支出并投资未来是一个基本常识。

sentences.english: It is common sense to put the seal to the wax while it is soft.
sentences.chinese: 趁着腊还软的时候印上印记，这个是众所皆知的常识。

sentences.english: A position as data-processing manager that will accredit me to utilize my ability of computer systems.
sentences.chinese: 资料处理经理的职务，能保障我运用电脑系统的常识。

sentences.english: Here to expand the vision, learn not learn a lot of books of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 在这搭拓展了视阈，学到很多书本里学不到的常识。

sentences.english: There’s an awful lot of common sense reasons not to frequent prostitutes while going abroad.
sentences.chinese: 太多太多的常识教导我们在国外不要嫖妓。

sentences.english: A politician has to have good insight as well as common sense.
sentences.chinese: 一个政治家一定要有洞察力及常识。

sentences.english: THE conventional wisdom about southern politics is that it all comes down to race.
sentences.chinese: 根据一般常识，南部地区政治归根结底与种族有关。

sentences.english: So this is the common-sense law.
When you use color in a warranty document, let common sense be your guide.
sentences.chinese: 当你使用颜色在质保书中，普通常识可以用作指导。

definition: popular science/popularization of science/abbr. of 科學普及|科学普及
mistaken ideas/misconceptions/the error of one's ways
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
lit. to know one and understand half (idiom); a smattering of knowledge/dilettante/amateur
